t:
With thousands of people dying everyday, we had no place left to bury or cremate the dead.



We were happy when we finally found place, but now we could not find the bodies.
c:
We found our answer when we heard the crunch.

Stay home, stay safe. Wear a mask and maintain social distancing when going out.



#death #body #bury #cremation #crowded #disappear #lost #undead
